entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 14.
